entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning in the evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 31 in the evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 11 February 2023
